Service Details: - Grows vegetables that we donate to the Lake Country Food Assistance Society, the Central Okanagan Community Food Bank and The Salvation Army Central Okanagan- The food banks in turn distribute the vegetables to various organizations within the valley who give the food to their clients- Operates incubator farms, teaching new, start-up farmers to grow vegetables and start their own businesses on land that they have been gifted use of- Operated by a small group of volunteers- Volunteer opportunities available
